title: In which Stefan and Vox discuss cultural war
author: VD
content_html: Just in case you’ve got nearly two hours to kill. We go into art, literature, culture, politics, you name it. Castalia fans will be interested to hear me name-drop one of our new authors we have not yet announced.
content_text:
Just in case you’ve got nearly
two hours to kill
. We go into art, literature, culture, politics, you name it. Castalia fans will be interested to hear me name-drop one of our new authors we have not yet announced.
